column4: what's the best way of installing realplayer?  is there a particular version/alternate program (besides mplayer) i should go for?
you can just download from real.com and install according to their instructions
i'd be surprised if someone had put it in a deb - i doubt that'd be legal
no, there's an rpm for rp10 on the site...but the realplayer package in the repo recommends getting rp8 when run
i would just install the latest version.
